subject: Re: My mistruths...
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
I listened to an internet radio show yesterday where Mr. Moran was a 
guest.  He spoke about sending his field researchers out with mini-
boxes to schools, nursing homes, colleges, etc.  He was very open 
about it on the show.  He advised the audience that he wanted to get 
opinions about the box from all walks of life.  I don't think this is 
something he is trying to hide...???

Many of us our researchers here, and I think we would love to have 
our experimental devices tested by others.  Speaking of that, did you 
ever ask Mr. Moon to try the Radio Shack Hack 12-469/mixer setup I 
put together?  I seem to recall asking you to ask him a while back.

I would like his opinion on how it works for him. I don't think he 
will melt or anything by using it...

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "babiarz3" <babiarz3@...> wrote:

that

with

begin
